mapper.sql: id, babyinfo_Id, illness, create_time, conversation_id, status, caseImg, resultImg, otherImg, positionImg
mapper.select: SELECT hid.illness, sbb.name, sbb.birthday FROM healthrecord_illness_describe hid LEFT JOIN sys_baby_baseinfo sbb ON sbb.id = hid.babyinfo_Id LEFT JOIN consultphone_register_service crs ON crs.illness_describe_id = hid.id WHERE crs.id = #{sys_phoneConsult_id,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: insert into healthRecord_illness_describe (id, babyinfo_Id, illness, create_time, conversation_id, status, caseImg, resultImg, otherImg, positionImg) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{babyinfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{conversationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update healthRecord_illness_describe
babyinfo_Id = #{babyinfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
illness = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
conversation_id = #{conversationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
caseImg = #{caseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resultImg = #{resultimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
otherImg = #{otherimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionImg = #{positionimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update healthRecord_illness_describe set babyinfo_Id = #{babyinfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, illness = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, conversation_id = #{conversationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caseImg = #{caseimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resultImg = #{resultimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otherImg = #{otherimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionImg = #{positionimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
